## BODY\_CONTENT\_RENDERER\_OPTIONS variable

Token for injecting options for content body renderer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
BODY_CONTENT_RENDERER_OPTIONS: InjectionToken<VisualPluginOptions>
```
